gt_text: '哲学入門の授業は408教室に変更されました', '紛失物：黒いリュック（中に微積分の教科書あり）。謝礼あり。', '今すぐ参加登録を！ロボットクラブは水曜午後6時に2A実験室で開催', '学生カウンセリング受付中 — 112号室', '中間試験復習パーティー • 無料ピザ • 10月12日 • 図書館の共有スペース', 'リス観察クラブに参加しよう – あの大きなオークの木の下に集合', '廊下でのスケートボードは禁止 – 罰金25ドル', '落とし物：ダンベル型の水筒。受付でお受け取りください', '学部長講演シリーズ – ゲスト：シモーネ・レー博士、テーマ：AIと倫理 – 10月18日', 'ルームメイト募集中：静かで非喫煙者優先。MiaまでSMSを送ってください'
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Busy university hallway setting
*   Left wall of the hallway
*   Large bulletin board (affixed to the left wall)
*   Multiple printed flyers (on the bulletin board)
*   Multiple handwritten notes (on the bulletin board)
*   Multiple posters (on the bulletin board)
*   Bulletin board completely filled with flyers, notes, and posters
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '哲学导论课程已改至408教室'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '丢失：黑色背包内有微积分课本。酬谢。'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '立即报名！机器人俱乐部周三下午6点在2A实验室开会'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '学生心理咨询已开放 — 112室'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '期中复习派对 • 免费披萨 • 10月12日 • 图书馆公共区'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '加入松鼠观察社团 – 我们在那棵大橡树下集合'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '禁止在走廊滑滑板 – 罚款25美元'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '失物招领：哑铃形状的水瓶。请到前台领取'
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: "院长讲座系列 – 嘉宾：Simone Rae博士，主题：人工智能与伦理 – 10月18日"
*   Flyer with legible Chinese text: '寻室友：安静、非吸烟者优先。请发短信联系Mia'
*   Varied, non-repeated flyers, notes, and posters
*   Flyers/posters with a printed appearance
*   Notes/flyers with a handwritten (marker) appearance
*   Slightly tilted flyers/notes/posters
*   Overlapping flyers/notes/posters
*   Two students (in the foreground)
*   Students standing close to the bulletin board
*   Students actively reading the bulletin board
*   One student holding a coffee cup
*   One student holding a stack of folders
*   Students' backs mostly facing the camera
*   Students' heads visible (slightly turned towards the board)
*   One student pointing at a flyer on the board
*   Students partially occluding the bulletin board
*   Students positioned as the closest elements to the camera
